mapper.select:
select
from settle_bill_opreate_info where del_flag = '0' and settle_id = #{settleId} order by opreat_date desc

SELECT
FROM settle_bill_opreate_info WHERE INSTR( operator_content, '111' ) != 0 AND INSTR( operator_content, '合并支付对账单！结算单号' ) !=0
